i have problems chewing my food.
i work as a veterinarian.

I'm single and enjoy my freedom, but I'm open to meeting someone special.
i m in love with adam levine.
I have a tattoo on my back that they don't know about.
I enjoy picking wild strawberries with my son on our weekend camping trips.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
It's going well, thanks. Just got out of work. How about you?
It's going good. I just got home from a weekend camping trip with my son.
Oh that sounds fun! Did you guys have a good time?
Yes, we did! We picked wild strawberries and had a campfire.
That sounds like a great time. I love camping.
Me too! It's so peaceful and relaxing.
I'm glad you had a good time. What are your plans for the week?
I'm not sure yet. I might go see a movie or something.
That sounds like a good idea. What movie do you want to see?
I'm not sure yet. I'll have to look at the listings.
Okay. Well, I hope you have a good week.
